content: {"version":2,"machineId":"a61ad0ad-feb9-4402-acb3-4a8c47ecb067","content":"{\"mac\":\"// Place your key bindings in this file to overwrite the defaults\\n[\\n    {\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"cmd+k\\\",\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"editor.action.addCommentLine\\\",\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"editorTextFocus && !editorReadonly\\\"\\n    },\\n    {\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"cmd+k cmd+c\\\",\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"-editor.action.addCommentLine\\\",\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"editorTextFocus && !editorReadonly\\\"\\n    },\\n    {\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"shift+cmd+k\\\",\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"editor.action.removeCommentLine\\\",\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"editorTextFocus && !editorReadonly\\\"\\n    },\\n    {\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"cmd+k cmd+u\\\",\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"-editor.action.removeCommentLine\\\",\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"editorTextFocus && !editorReadonly\\\"\\n    },\\n    {\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"cmd+[Semicolon]\\\",\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"workbench.action.terminal.new\\\"\\n    },\\n    {\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+shift+`\\\",\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"-workbench.action.terminal.new\\\"\\n    }\\n]\"}"}
